title: Bridging Component Optimization and System Integration: Systematic Evidence of Workflow Discontinuities in Microstrip Antenna Design for Small Satellite Platforms - Data Repository
description:
Systematic Review Data Repository

This repository contains the complete dataset, analysis files, and supplementary materials for a systematic review examining empirical workflow configurations in CubeSat antenna design. Following PRISMA 2020 guidelines, we analyzed 79 studies from 551 initial records across four major databases.

Key Contents:

  • Complete bibliographic database (551 records)
  • PRISMA screening data (phases 1-4)
  • 79 included studies with full extraction
  • Analysis organized by 4 specific objectives
  • Inductive cross-study analysis
  • PDF collection of included articles

Main Findings:

  • Electromagnetic simulation: 85% achieving Â±1.5 dB simulation-measurement agreement
  • Critical integration gaps: 71% feeding-to-system, 86% thermal validation deficiency
  • Workflow configurations: simulation-validation (60-70%), prototyping-fabrication (5-10%)
  • Four dominant validation approaches identified with systematic resource constraints

Data Structure:

  • recoleccion/: Database search data (Scopus, IEEE, EBSCOhost, ScienceDirect)
  • screening/: PRISMA screening process data
  • OE1/: Objective 1 - Electromagnetic simulation (50 studies)
  • OE2/: Objective 2 - Experimental validation (50 studies)
  • OE3/: Objective 3 - Feeding integration (14 studies)
  • OE4/: Objective 4 - Fabrication workflows (13 studies)
  • objetive-dataDriven/: Inductive cross-study analysis
  • articulosPDF/: 79 included articles (subject to publisher copyright)

For detailed methodology, see PRISMA_METADATA.md
references: Page MJ, McKenzie JE, Bossuyt PM, et al. The PRISMA 2020 statement: an updated guideline for reporting systematic reviews. BMJ 2021;372:n71. doi: 10.1136/bmj.n71
notes:
Data Quality and Reproducibility:
  • All data extracted from peer-reviewed sources
  • PRISMA 2020 protocol strictly followed
  • Quality assessment: 5 dimensions evaluated
  • Inductive analysis provides traceability from empirical patterns to analytical priorities
Usage Notes:
  • CSV files: UTF-8 encoding, comma-delimited
  • Excel files: .xlsx format
  • Text files: UTF-8 encoding
  • PDF files in articulosPDF/ are copyrighted by respective publishers
Recommended Citation: See CITATION.cff file
For questions: See README.md for contact information
method: Systematic review following PRISMA 2020 guidelines. Multi-database search (Scopus, IEEE Xplore, EBSCOhost, ScienceDirect) covering January 2000 - November 2025. Four-phase screening process. Convergent engineering-evidence synthesis methodology. Inductive cross-study thematic analysis for objective formulation.
